meta.about: 歡迎嚟到 Monkey Tree English Learning Center 嘅專頁！我地係專門培訓3-12歲小朋友嘅英文課程學院，喺香港超過60間分校！快啲「Like / 讚好」我地，收取更多英文資訊同特別優惠啦！

Monkey Tree English Learning Center Ltd.
● Laugh, Learn & Grow with Us!
● Over 60 centers in Hong Kong
● 3563 6771

meta.name: Monkey Tree English Learning Center
meta.about:
Welcome to Monkey Tree's Official YouTube page! We hope you enjoy our clips!

Our goal at Monkey Tree is simple; to utilize a communicative approach with small class sizes to make our courses fun, interactive, and relevant. Teachers from Monkey Tree are made up of well-qualified and experienced professionals with specialist teaching qualifications. We work hard to meet the specific needs of each of our students. No matter the age or proficiency level, our classes are designed to build confidence, creativity, and of course your child's English skills.

For more information regarding Monkey Tree & our family, please visit our Official Website!
